channel.title: Posting on MITB
channel.description:
So the third or fourth time EVER posting on the MITB forums i got a warning. ( [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,410991/3031613.html#3031613]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,410991/3031613.html#3031613[/url] )
Theres why. I dont think im going to post on there much anymore, other than the graphics section, because the Staff on there seem way more uptight, then on Moparscape forums. Is it just me that thinks that?

item.title: Posting on MITB
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Obviously you’re going to get a warning for spam. It doesn’t matter if you’re new or not. I don’t know why “No.” didn’t get a warning, but I guess it just happened that way. MITB has a lot more intelligent people than this site, so they basically hate us. You can find about 50 billion threads on the subject, so there really isn’t a need for this one. If anyone wants to have this reopened, message me.

Read full topic
